metadata.synopsis: The Zhent Leader arrived at the Guildhall after being bribed in the Abandoned Cistern and calls the Zhentarim to action.

0.speaker: Roah Moonglow
0.text: Diplomacy won't do it, lads - we'll do it the other way!
0.context: NodeContext: Calling out to your crew to attack - faux-shrug, like 'oh well, we tried'
